system.description: Effect: The user is cured of a Status Affliction and the target is given that Status Affliction. If the target cannot receive that Status Affliction, the user is only cured of the Status Affliction when using this Attack.

actions.name: Psycho Shift
actions.description: Effect: The user is cured of a Status Affliction and the target is given that Status Affliction. If the target cannot receive that Status Affliction, the user is only cured of the Status Affliction when using this Attack.
